title: What is this Golden Spatula Club?
body: The greediness of this company has hit a new level that has not been touched by EA yet. I thought the skin borders and prestige skins were bad. This... this is just pathetic.

replies.body: It's why Riot kept ARURF. Basically made it so you get some extra rerolls, free skins and stuff like that. On top of that, you get to earn those tokens much faster by unlocking "the stash". It's just a cash grab
